name: SkyCrypt Sunrise Orange Theme
description:
A theme based around sunrise for SkyCrypt.
The background screenshot uses BSL Shaders version 7.1.04.1
Location is the Mushroom Desert in Hypixel SkyBlock
additional_info:
Theme created by rainbowcraft2
V1 released September 24, 2020

V2 released September 25, 2020
-Fixed some bugs and implemented some missing features
